definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: When he was but twelve years old he was already studying Tendai philosophical speculation.
sentences.chinese: 他十二岁时已经开始研习天台宗经书。

sentences.english: The Buddhist Sect of Mount Tiantai is rich in ideology for education.
sentences.chinese: 天台宗中蕴含着丰富的教育思想。

sentences.english: Tiantai Sect is the first Buddhism Sect in China.
sentences.chinese: 天台宗是我国第一个佛教宗派。

sentences.english: Tiantai sect is a Buddhism sect of Chinese style.
sentences.chinese: 天台宗是中国化的佛教宗派。

sentences.english: A farmer requested a Tendai priest to recite sutras for his wife, who had died.
sentences.chinese: 农夫死了妻子，邀请天台宗师傅给她念经超度。

definition: Chinese Buddhist school founded on the Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra (Garland sutra)
Yogācāra school of Buddhism/Dharma-character school of Buddhism
Yogācāra school of Buddhism/Consciousness-only school of Buddhism
Zhiyi (538-597), founder of the Tiantai sect of Buddhism
see 淨土宗|净土宗[Jing4 tu3 zong1]
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
